t: Armis Security - 2025 Company Profile, Funding & Competitors - Tracxn
s: April 7, 2025 - Armis Security - Provider of a wireless security platform for IoT applications. Acquired by CapitalG. Raised a total funding of $800M over 6 rounds from 19 investors. Valued at $4.2B. Founded by Yevgeny Dibrov, Nadir Izrael and 1 other in the year 2015. Armis Security has 305 competitors.
